description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. [Mrs. Charles Dana Gibson speaking] [1913 Oct.] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title devised by Library staff. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2010 and similar Bain negative: LC-B2-2873-3) Cation from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative: Mrs. H.B. Harriman. Photo shows Mrs. Charles Dana Gibson, the former Irene Langhorne (d. 1956) campaigning for Mayor Mitchel in October 1913. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2010) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.14684 Call Number: LC-B2- 2889-15
